abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Teleport forward a short distance. Removes all debuffs on use.

abilities.name: Ice Storm
abilities.description: Evie launches an ice storm forward, slowing and dealing damage to all enemies inside.

abilities.name: Ice Block
abilities.description: Become immune to all damage for 3 seconds. Cannot move or attack.

abilities.name: Soar
abilities.description: Hop up on your staff and take flight.

abilities.name: Ice Staff
abilities.description: An Ice Staff that fires a frozen blast that explodes in an area on impact
